casebody.data:
STATE of Missouri, Respondent,
v.
Jeremy Todd O'DELL, Appellant. WD 80944 Missouri Court of Appeals, Western District. ORDER FILED: October 30, 2018 Attorneys: Jeffrey Eastman, Gladstone, MO Counsel for Appellant. Attorneys: Richard Starnes, Jefferson City, MO Counsel for Respondent. Before Division Two: Alok Ahuja, P.J., Thomas H. Newton, and Mark D. Pfeiffer, JJ.

ORDER

Per Curiam:

Mr. Jeremy Todd O'Dell appeals the conviction by a Clay County jury of driving while intoxicated. § 577.010. The trial court sentenced Mr. O'Dell as an aggravated offender to four years of imprisonment in the Missouri Department of Corrections. We affirm. Rule 30.25(b).
